title: Penelope's Plight
description: Penelope has been haunted by the spirits her entire life. Now a young woman, she has realized that her purpose is to help them, often by getting revenge.When a young spirit named Grace wants revenge on her husband, the man responsible for her death, Penelope once again cannot resist helping. Only this time, the target is an irresistibly handsome and sweet man who seems to want nothing more than a simple life, forgiveness, and someone to love.This job might turn out to be more than Penelope can handle.(This book is an adult paranormal romance that is not part of the Solace Series. It may be read independently from Sarah's Solace #1 and Alexis' Afterlife #2).
author: Wendy Risher
